scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && npm run publish:latest
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && npm run publish:latest
scripts.version:major: npm version major && npm run publish:latest
scripts.version:alpha: npm version prerelease --preid=alpha && npm run publish:alpha
scripts.version:beta: npm version prerelease --preid=beta && npm run publish:beta
scripts.version:rc: npm version prerelease --preid=rc && npm run publish:rc
